Military Threat Awareness Act of 2022
To require a public report on the military capabilities of China, Iran, North Korea, and Russia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Military Threat Awareness Act of 2022
This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to make publicly available reports on the military capabilities of China, Iran, North Korea, and Russia. Each report must be made available in unclassified form on a publicly accessible DOD website.
DOD may use or add to any existing reports to respond to the reporting requirement.
